description:
Kaoru asks Aoi to go shopping with her the next day. When Aoi wonders what to wear for that event she discovers an old kimono she had inherited from her grandmother who told her "the feelings of a person wearing a kimono become part of the kimono itself", and that she should wear it walking with her companion.
And then Kaoru wants to visit his old apartment which is unoccupied now and brings up more memories.
